title: David Rogers: The Mentor of Might

story.text: David Rogers starts his week at the local community center, coaching a youth soccer team. Unbeknownst to him, a strange glowing object buried beneath the field begins to emit a mysterious energy.

After being exposed to the strange energy, David discovers he has gained the ability to inspire and boost people's confidence just by being nearby. He uses this new power during a mentoring session, helping a shy teenager confidently deliver a school presentation.
David further explores his powers by helping a local business team overcome their internal conflicts and work together harmoniously. The entire office achieves record productivity.
David decides to keep his powers a secret, but his enhanced aura accidentally makes him the center of attention at a community fundraiser, resulting in record-breaking donations.
Realizing the potential, David visits a hospital, where his presence helps patients feel inexplicably better, quickening their recovery times. Nurses and doctors notice the unusual improvements.
The glowing object beneath the soccer field starts affecting others, giving them minor abilities. David teaches them to control and use their powers for the benefit of the community.
David establishes a group for all those affected, offering guidance and mentoring. They decide to use their powers to continue making their town a better place.

ending: Thus, David Rogers becomes a true superhero, not by fighting crime, but by empowering others.
moral: True heroes are those who bring out the hero in others.
